purpose: The email announces a call for papers (CfP) for a special issue of the Information and Software Technology journal focused on 'Next-Generation Model-Based Software Engineering with Foundation Models.' It invites researchers to submit original, unpublished work that explores the intersection of model-based software engineering (MBE) and foundation models (FMs). The special issue aims to highlight innovations and applications of FMs in various MBE tasks, such as model completion and development of domain-specific languages. Submissions will undergo a rigorous review process, and the email outlines specific topics of interest for potential papers.
